comments.content: I'm watching Castle, it's really rather good. Other's on the list include Lie to Me, The Simpsons, Bones, Big Bang Theory and I lose track of the others. I guess your TV tracking app would come in handy! Turn it into an iPhone app!! One that works, not like craptastic Wordpress.
